"Mission Pass":
"The Mission Pass is a system that allows you to progress through stages, called Tiers, and earn rewards each time you reach a new Tier.

You can make progress towards your next Tier by collecting Stars. Stars are awarded when you complete certain Daily or Weekly Tasks."

"The Mission Pass has Normal Rewards and Gold Rewards.

Gold Rewards can only be obtained after using a Premium Set or an N-Mission Gold Pass."
"You can access the Mission Pass by opening the Main Menu, selecting <yellow>Tasks/Quests<c>, then selecting <yellow>Mission Pass<c>."
